this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - light pink pink and black - yarn needle - scissors final size - 8 cm diameter technical notes *rounds 1-3 are joined with a slip_stitch *these slip stitches are worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern axolotl coaster start with light pink round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts *change colour to pink round 4 chain 1 in the first st make 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet followed by 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in the next st then in the next st make 1 slip_stitch repeat 3 times 21 sts fasten_off skip 6 stitches and pull through with chain 1 insert your hook the pink yarn into the 7th stitch in the first st fasten_off cut about 30 cm make 1 single_crochet 1 of black yarn to half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet sew on a face followed by 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in the next st then in the next st make 1 slip_stitch repeat 3 times 21 sts make sure to work around the yarn tail to hide it repeat a few times to make the eye thicker link to video https //youtu be/r9regdqulry if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
